pageProduct.name: Swisse Magnesium Powder Berry 180g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Swisse Ultiboost High Strength Magnesium Powder Berry is a premium quality formula containing two forms of magnesium to support healthy muscle function and help relieve muscle cramps when dietary intake is inadequate. With a natural berry flavour, it's a great tasting alternative for those who have difficulty swallowing tablets or capsules.

Easily Absorbed: Formulated with a bioavailable form of magnesium (citrate), which is easily absorbed when compared to magnesium oxide.

Muscle Cramp Relief: Magnesium helps relieve muscle cramps when dietary intake is inadequate. Magnesium also supports healthy muscle function.

Mild Muscle Spasm Relief: Magnesium helps relieve and reduce mild muscle spasms when dietary intake is inadequate.

Nervous System Health Support: Magnesium helps support a healthy nervous system.

Supports Energy Production: Magnesium helps the metabolism of carbohydrates and fats and converts them into energy.

Size: 180g
